name: Astral Plane
effect:
This (RC) is an Astral Plane. Astral Planes have the following rules.
・Grade is ignored when calling an <Astral Deity>.
・If the card on the Astral Plane is not an <Astral Deity>, put it into the drop zone.
・The unit on the Astral Plane can attack from the back row, and performs drive checks. Cards revealed for those drive checks are put into your soul instead of your hand.
・At the end of your turn, put the unit on the Astral Plane on the bottom of your deck.

name: Black Shiver, Gavrail
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if a total of three or more new cards were put into any player's damage zone this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], return a card from your damage zone to your hand, put a card from your damage zone on the bottom of your deck, and deal this unit two damage. (Perform a damage check for each damage)

name: Sunrise Ray Knight, Gurguit
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit and all of your units placed by a card's ability this turn get [Power] +5000 for each of your additional (RC).
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When it attacks or is attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at five cards from the top of your deck, call up to two cards from among them to (RC), and shuffle your deck. If it is your opponent's turn, call them to (GC) instead of (RC).

name: Holy Heavenly Dragon, Eosanesis Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC):If your (VC) has five or more force markers, your back row center circle becomes an Astral Plane. (Only an Astral Deity can be on an Astral Plane)
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one , reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, get an Imaginary Gift:Force, and put that marker on your (VC).
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard an <Astral Poet> or from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Mythic Beast, Fenrir
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast one or more cards], search your deck for up to one card with the same grade as the sum of the grades of the cards [Soul-Blast] for this cost, reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and call a card from your hand to (RC).
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When your card is put from your soul into your drop zone, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call one of those cards to (RC).
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Dragonic Vanquisher “FULLBRONTO”
effect:
[CONT](VC):This unit is also regarded as "Dragonic Vanquisher".
[AUTO](VC):When placed, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO]:When bound from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is "Dragonic Vanquisher", [COST][discard a card from your hand], ride this card as [Stand], and this unit gets drive -1 until end of turn. During that turn's end phase, you cannot get Imaginary Gift:Accel, and at the end of that turn, ride a grade 3 from your soul as [Rest]. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Holy Seraph, Nociel
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with "Nociel" in its card name, put it into your damage zone, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your damage zone, at the end of that turn, put a card from your damage zone on the bottom of your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], if you have three or more face up cards with "Nociel" in their card names in your damage zone, [Stand] one of your rear-guards, and if you have five or more face up cards with "Nociel" in their card names in your damage zone, [Stand] two rear-guards instead of one.

name: Black Aculeus, Japhkiel
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn. Return a card from your damage zone to your hand, and if you returned a card, deal one damage to your vanguard. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn. (Perform a damage check)

[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][put another rear-guard into your soul], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, return this unit to your hand.

[AUTO](VC):When placed, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO]:When bound from hand during your turn, if your vanguard is "Dragonic Vanquisher", [COST][discard a card from your hand], ride this card as [Stand], and this unit gets drive -1 until end of turn. During that turn's end phase, you cannot get Imaginary Gift:Accel, and at the end of that turn, ride a grade 3 from your soul as [Rest]. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Holy Seraph, Nociel
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one card with "Nociel" in its card name, put it into your damage zone, and shuffle your deck. If you put a card into your damage zone, at the end of that turn, put a card from your damage zone on the bottom of your deck.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], if you have three or more face up cards with "Nociel" in their card names in your damage zone, [Stand] one of your rear-guards, and if you have five or more face up cards with "Nociel" in their card names in your damage zone, [Stand] two rear-guards instead of one.

name: Black Aculeus, Japhkiel
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn. Return a card from your damage zone to your hand, and if you returned a card, deal one damage to your vanguard. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Black Call, Nakir
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if a new card was put into any player's damage zone this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Oath Liberator, Aglovale
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at three cards from the top of your deck, call up to one card from among them to (RC), and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][put another rear-guard into your soul], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, return this unit to your hand.

name: Dawning Knight, Gorboduc
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if two or more of your rear-guards were called this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card into your hand, discard a card from your hand.

name: Cosmic Regalia, CEO Yggdrasil
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):All of your rear-guards with divine gauge get "Boost". If this unit is on (VC), and it is your opponent's turn, those rear-guards cannot be affected by your opponent's cards.
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Regalia of Fate, Norn", call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, choose up to two of your rear-guards, and put up to one card from your soul face down as a divine gauge for each of them.

name: Unappeasable Biter, Gleipnir
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], choose a card from your soul, and return it to your hand.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Mythic Beast, Skoll
effect:

name: Eradicator, Dragonic Descendant
effect:
[CONT]:When you would ride this card, if your vanguard is a unit with "Eradicator" in its card name, this card is placed with all of their abilities until end of turn.
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, bind it, your opponent chooses one of his or her back row rear-guards, and moves it to an open front row (RC).
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When its attack does not hit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Eradicator, Plasmacatapult Dragon
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, bind it, your opponent chooses one of his or her back row rear-guards, moves it to an open front row (RC), and if this unit is on (VC), you draw a card.

name: Rockclimb Dragoon
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked, if your vanguard is "Dragonic Vanquisher", [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, [COST][bind a card from your hand], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and bind it.

name: Bluish Flame Liberator, Percival
effect:
[CONT](VC):All of the units on your additional (RC) get [Power] +5000.

This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.

name: Regalia of Fate, Norn
effect:
[ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and choose one of your rear-guards. You may put a card from your soul face down as a divine gauge for that unit. If you put a card, [Soul-Charge 2].
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle it boosted a unit with "Regalia" in its card name, [COST][discard a card from your hand and one of this unit's divine gauge], [Stand] the boosted unit, and that unit gets [Power] +10000/drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Black Observe, Hamiel
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, if you have a vanguard with "Black" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], call a card from your damage zone to (RC), and deal one damage to your vanguard. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn. (Perform a damage check)
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 3], until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +15000/[Critical] +１, and your opponent cannot call sentinels from his or her hand to (GC). At the end of that battle, put this unit into your soul.
